exerciseMakersModal.seeFullHistoryOnGith:
**Functional Purpose**: Link text to view the exercise's full history on GitHub.
**UI Location**: Exercise Makers Modal (top banner link)
**When Users See This**: When the Exercise Makers modal is open.
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no variables.
**Current English**: "See the full history of this exercise on GitHub"
exerciseMakersModal.authors:
**Functional Purpose**: Heading for the authors section.
**UI Location**: Exercise Makers Modal → Authors section heading
**When Users See This**: When the Exercise Makers modal is open and there are authors.
**Technical Context**: Appears before a count of authors; no special formatting.
**Current English**: "Authors"
exerciseMakersModal.peopleWhoWroteExerci:
**Functional Purpose**: Subtitle describing authors.
**UI Location**: Exercise Makers Modal → Authors section subtitle
**When Users See This**: When the Exercise Makers modal is open and there are authors.
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no variables.
**Current English**: "People who wrote the exercise"
exerciseMakersModal.contributors:
**Functional Purpose**: Heading for the contributors section.
**UI Location**: Exercise Makers Modal → Contributors section heading
**When Users See This**: When the Exercise Makers modal is open and there are contributors.
**Technical Context**: Appears before a count of contributors; no special formatting.
**Current English**: "Contributors"
exerciseMakersModal.peopleWhoUpdatedExer:
**Functional Purpose**: Subtitle describing contributors.
**UI Location**: Exercise Makers Modal → Contributors section subtitle
**When Users See This**: When the Exercise Makers modal is open and there are contributors.
